LDR_STP <- read.table("./LDR_Normscore.txt",header=T)
TC_STP <- read.table("./TC_Normscore.txt",header=T)
Examp <- rbind(subset(LDR_STP,Genes=="ENSSSCG00000015405"),subset(TC_STP,Genes=="ENSSSCG00000015405"))
Examp["Groups"] <- c("LDR","TC")
Examp2 <- melt(Examp,value.name = "Exp")


ggplot(Examp2, aes(x=variable, y=Exp, fill=Groups,group=Groups)) + geom_line(color="grey",linetype="solid",size=1) + geom_point(color="black",shape=21,size=4) + scale_fill_manual(values=c("#53B3E9","#E39500")) + theme_bw() + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1),axis.title=element_text(size=14,face="bold"), axis.text=element_text(size=12),panel.grid.major = element_blank(),panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),legend.position="none") + labs(title = Examp2$Genes) + coord_cartesian(y=c(0,1))
